scripts.update:account-observer: npm run update-commons --prefix ./account-observer && npm run docker:build --prefix ./account-observer && npm run docker:push --prefix ./account-observer
scripts.update:candles-processor: npm run update-commons --prefix ./candles-processor && npm run docker:build --prefix ./candles-processor && npm run docker:push --prefix ./candles-processor
scripts.update:observer: npm run update-commons --prefix ./observer && npm run docker:build --prefix ./observer && npm run docker:push --prefix ./observer
scripts.update:positions-processor: npm run update-commons --prefix ./positions-processor && npm run docker:build --prefix ./positions-processor && npm run docker:push --prefix ./positions-processor
scripts.update:signals-processor: npm run update-commons --prefix ./signals-processor && npm run docker:build --prefix ./signals-processor && npm run docker:push --prefix ./signals-processor
scripts.update:trader: npm run update-commons --prefix ./trader && npm run docker:build --prefix ./trader && npm run docker:push --prefix ./trader
scripts.update:all: npm run update:account-observer && npm run update:candles-processor && npm run update:positions-processor && npm run update:signals-processor && npm run update:observer && npm run update:trader
